resources.string:
"This app helps you keep up on the latest SBU buzz. Simply touch one of the icons on the main screen to see SBU's calendar, campus map, or latest headlines and sports news.

You can touch any headline, location, or event for additional information.

Return to the main menu at any time by pressing the BACK button.

Think this app is pretty fresh? Send tribute to xXherpderpXx@gmail.com"
